title: I think there needs to be a drunk game mode
body:
There are some that go out or drink alone...

But I think there should be a function or a game type where its 3am+ 
we are off our tits smashed but love this game so we play it while drunk
but don't want to hurt anyone due to our drunkenness and think there should
be something we can say... "I'm not of sound mind but i want to play mode"

Surely I'm not the only one thinking this where we live to play regardless of our condition.

Lord SilentEcho signing off

replies.body: i would like to see duo jg, one specifically for invading, one for their own jungle, also, i want hexakill on the rift, so u can experiment with new metas

It's called late-night normals.

And you take a shot every time you die in-game, every time one of your tower is down, every time dragon or baron is killed by enemy team, and every time "noob", "gg" or "ez" appears in chat.

Have fun. But don't forget to stop if you really can't take in any more drinks.
I'm pretty sure that in some games, even a world champion drinker would be wasted before 10min.

i would solely play the gamemode because im sick of the regular game and just to be in a game that lasts 40+ minutes without being confined to meta or 'expectations'. But yeah there should be a gamemode, like a mode where you just get a lot of gold/second, no death timers and a free teleport every time you revive. Like the game would have no time for you to be left out and you could just do whatever
